name: RiskCube
long_description:
RiskCube is building an AI-powered platform for insurance agents offering:
✅ AI Policy Analysis – Instantly analyze and compare commercial insurance policies.
✅ Custom AI Solutions – Tailored AI to automate workflows and enhance brokerage operations.
✅ Natural Disaster Software – Climate risk analytics, live event tracking, and predictive modeling for wildfires, floods, hurricanes, etc.

RiskCube for businesses
✅ Get Matched with the Right Brokers – We connect you with expert insurance agencies that leverage AI to find the best coverage for your business.
✅ Faster, More Efficient Process – Save time with a streamlined, data-driven insurance experience.
one_liner: We help insurance agents scale their business with AI.
